text: Ðis sinden þa landan gemæro to beorhtwaldingtune.

Ærest of curspandic up on acdene of acdene to wigferþis leage of wigferðis leage to pippes leage of pippes leage norð &lang hagan to þan brandan stane of þam stane to dunian mere <þonen> þonon norð rihte to hæsel lea.

Of hæsel lea þest rihte to borsenan beorge of ðam beorge west riht on þone haranstan of ðan stane norð rihte to stan crundele þonnan &lang weges to þam langan treowe of þam trowe &lang weges to mærfloden þonne giet &lang weges þæt eft on cyrspandic.
